column2: "You're really gonna go take down a Garongo for me? No, I'm totally psyched, but I didn't actually think you'd do it!"
"I'll just put it out there, but I don't need to put on any airs or contrariness, right?"
"I mean, just how the heck are you supposed to hurt that massive rocky thing anyway?"
"Still, I can't say I won't enjoy watching this. It's gonna be awesome!"
